titles.title: Remote Patient Monitoring Access Act
Remote Patient Monitoring Access Act
To amend the CARES Act to clarify authorized uses of provider relief funds, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Remote Patient Monitoring Access Act or RPM Access Act
This bill allows certain COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) relief funds for health care providers to be used for the provision of remote patient monitoring services that align with clinical guidelines and meet data security and privacy standards.
